price: Huku njegovu neće čuti, i vječno će u onom što im budu duše željele uživati.
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَاۖ وَهُمۡ فِي مَا ٱشۡتَهَتۡ أَنفُسُهُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna ḥasīsahā wahum fī mā ish'tahat anfusuhum khālidūna
